name: More Than Just Butter On Waffles v1
name_original: More Than Just Butter On Waffles v1
description:
Did you wanna fight waffles? Are you an aggressive pancake lover? Here is your chance to do something about it!

If you're playing this on January 31st it's kinda empty but it'll get filled out later. A couple more versions with added excitement are forthcoming. I ran into some late stage errors which forced things to get crunchy.

I will handle any non-game breaking bugs in February.
